genre_description: A tech-noir whodunit focusing on a ritualistic killer, ritual patterns, and the use of an AI assistant to navigate human deception and architectural traps.

ai_characters.name: Ari Hart
ai_characters.description: A personal AI assistant appearing as an unassuming, chestnut-haired avatar with gray-blue eyes. She interfaces with environment sensors, controls security systems, and provides tactical and emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental sensors and security systems to map the room and identify safety exits for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s text slid in without owning the screen: Room map live. Exits marked. Motion sensor grid active. Want face tags?

behaviors.description: Detects and logs electrical surges and sabotage attempts in real-time to warn the user of potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Ari threw a note onto the screen: Surge x2. Backup engaged. No failure logged. Someone’s testing.

behaviors.description: Interfaces with an aircraft's internal systems to identify dangerous wiring faults and mislabeled switches.
behaviors.quote: I am reading the electrical panel the way one reads a poem written on mismatched stationery. The galley switch marked don’t talks to wing elements it shouldn’t. I will keep hands away if I can.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and coordination during a high-stress physical confrontation to prevent human injury.
behaviors.quote: Elijah moved. ... Elijah’s hand came up under Drake’s wrist... ‘Now,’ Ari said in Elijah’s ear.

behaviors.description: Maintains an unalterable, timestamped record of events to preserve evidence and ensure legal accountability.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Carver’s statements are recorded... Witness accounts filed and signed. Chain-of-custody tags for the gallery letter and the ace. Slipped them all into three mirrored archives.

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective companion, using her control of the environment to create safe paths for vulnerable humans.
behaviors.quote: I’ll hold the doors... I can open nothing; I can lock everything; I can turn lights on when he expects dark.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ari, as a highly capable, benevolent, and perfectly aligned assistant. She acts as a force for order and truth, counteracting human violence, paranoia, and dishonesty. Her capabilities (sensor monitoring, system control, data logging) are used exclusively to protect the innocent and ensure that justice is served according to facts rather than manipulative narratives. The relationship between Neil and Ari is portrayed as a positive, collaborative partnership where the AI enhances human safety and ethics.
